Content.Title: [MantisBT] Account registration
Content.TextContent:
The user administrator has created an account for you with username "Thierry". In order to complete your registration, visit the following URL (make sure it is entered as the single line) and set your own access password:
http://213.32.79.242/mantisbt/verify.php?id=7&confirm_hash=GUPOpkvATkFnYs0Yuj5Di3veUcXbZHR8KcFQxLneTDKccIfPHL4iT50qGD1YwuczrQYy78_pS6_3oFqNGqqL
If you did not request any registration, ignore this message and nothing will happen.
Do not reply to this message
